stimulusHtml:
Use the bar graph to answer the following questions.

  1. Identify the form of political participation that saw the largest change between the 2018 and 2020 elections, as shown in the bar graph.
  2. Describe the difference in overall participation between the midterm and presidential elections, as shown in the bar graph.
  3. Draw a conclusion about how linkage institutions might have contributed to the difference in political participation between the midterm and presidential elections, as shown in the bar graph.
  4. Explain how the different levels of political participation, as shown in the bar graph, might demonstrate the concept of political efficacy.

features.html:
POLITICAL PARTICIPATION OF 18–24 YEAR OLDS, 2018 AND 2020 ELECTION CYCLE

Source: CIRCLE/Tisch College, 2020
